item.title: Geographical Analyses of GitHub Users
item.description: /* this chunk of code centers all of the headings */ h1, h2, h3 { text-align: center; } Approach To analyze GitHub users by different geographical units, we used regular expressions to recode all self-reported location data available in the GHTorrrent data, finding ~770,000 users with valid country codes. In addition to this self-reported location data, GHTorrent also provides latitude and longitude information for GitHub users (assigned using the Open Street Maps API).
